00001 /*
00002  * =====================================================================================
00003  *
00004  *       Filename:  simMc2Mesh.cc
00005  *
00006  *    Description:  This is a 2x2 mesh network with 3 trace packet generators
00007  *    and a single memory controller
00008  *
00009  *        Version:  1.0

00038 void
00039 dump_configuration ( void )
00040 {
00041     /* Creating mesh topology with the following config */
00042     cerr << " vcs:\t" << vcs << endl;
00043     cerr << " ports:\t" << ports << endl;
00044     cerr << " buffer_size:\t" << buffer_size << endl;
00045     cerr << " credits:\t" << credits << endl;
00046     cerr << " no_nodes( spread over a 2D Mesh topology):\t" << no_nodes << endl;
00047     cerr << " grid size:\t" << grid_size << endl;
00048     cerr << " links:  \t" << links << endl;
00049     cerr << " no_of_mcs:\t" << no_mcs << endl;
00050     cerr << " no_of_traces:\t" << traces.size() << endl;
00051     cerr << " max_sim_time:\t" << max_sim_time << endl;
00052     cerr << " max_phy_link_bits:\t" << max_phy_link_bits << endl;
00053     cerr << " THREAD_BITS_POSITION:\t" << THREAD_BITS_POSITION<< endl;
00054     cerr << " MC_ADDR_BITS:\t" << MC_ADDR_BITS<< endl;
00055     cerr << " TWO_STAGE_ROUTER:\t" << do_two_stage_router << endl;
00056     cerr << " ROUTING_SCHEME:\t" << routing_scheme << " " << rc_method << endl;
00057     cerr << " SW_ARBITRATION:\t" << sw_arbitration_scheme<< " " << sw_arbitration<< endl;
00058     cerr << " BANK_BITS:\t" << BANK_BITS << endl;
00059     cerr << " NETWORK_BITS:\t" << NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS << endl;
00060     cerr << " COMMAND_BITS:\t" << NETWORK_THREADID_BITS << endl;
00061     cerr << " COREID_BITS:\t" << NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS << endl;
00062     cerr << " NO_OF_THREADS:\t" << NO_OF_THREADS << endl;
00063     cerr << " NO_OF_RANKS:\t" << NO_OF_RANKS << endl;
00064     cerr << " NO_OF_BANKS:\t" << NO_OF_BANKS << endl;
00065     cerr << " NO_OF_ROWS:\t" << NO_OF_ROWS << endl;
00066     cerr << " NO_OF_COLUMNS:\t" << NO_OF_COLUMNS << endl;
00067     cerr << " COLUMN_SIZE:\t" << COLUMN_SIZE << endl;
00068     cerr << " Msg_class with arbitration priority:\t" << msg_type_string << endl;
00069 
00070     if( traces.size() < (no_nodes - no_mcs) )
00071     {
00072         cout << " Not enough trace files for simulation " << endl;
00073         exit(1);
00074     }
00075     return ;
00076 }

00080 int
00081 main ( int argc, char *argv[] )
00082 {
00083     ullint sim_start_time = time(NULL);
00084     if(argc<2)
00085     {
00086         cout << "Error: Requires config file for input parameters\n";
00087         return 1;
00088     }
00089 
00090 
00091     for(int ii=0;ii<8;ii++)
00092         for(int jj=0;jj<8;jj++)
00093             net_pack_info[ii][jj]=0;
00094 
00095     ifstream fd(argv[1]);
00096     string data, word;
00097     while(!fd.eof())
00098     {
00099         getline(fd,data);
00100         string::size_type position = -1;
00101         position = data.find("#");
00102         istringstream iss( data, istringstream::in);
00103         while ( position > data.size() && iss >> word )
00104         {
00105             if ( word.compare("PRINT_SETUP") == 0)   
00106                 iss >> print_setup;
00107             if ( word.compare("VCS") == 0)   
00108                 iss >> vcs;
00109             if ( word.compare("PORTS") == 0) 
00110                 iss >> ports;
00111             if ( word.compare("BUFFER_SIZE") == 0)
00112                 iss >> buffer_size;
00113             if ( word.compare("CREDITS") == 0)
00114                 iss >> credits;
00115             if ( word.compare("GRID_SIZE") == 0)
00116                 iss >> grid_size;
00117             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_NODES") == 0)
00118                 iss >> no_nodes;
00119             if ( word.compare("MCS") == 0)
00120                 iss >> no_mcs;
00121             if ( word.compare("MAX_SIM_TIME") == 0)
00122                 iss >> max_sim_time;
00123             if ( word.compare("OUTPUT_PATH") == 0)
00124                 iss >> output_path;
00125             if ( word.compare("PHY_LINK_WIDTH") == 0)
00126                 iss >> max_phy_link_bits;
00127             if ( word.compare("ROUTER_MODEL") == 0)
00128                 iss >> router_model_string;
00129             NO_OF_THREADS = no_nodes;
00130             /* Init parameters of mc_constants
00131             if ( word.compare("MC_MODEL") == 0)
00132                 iss >> mc_model_string;
00133             if ( word.compare("THREAD_BITS_POSITION") == 0)
00134                 iss >> THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00135             if ( word.compare("MC_ADDR_BITS") == 0)
00136                 iss >> MC_ADDR_BITS;
00137             if ( word.compare("BANK_BITS") == 0)
00138                 iss >> BANK_BITS;
00139             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_CHANNELS") == 0)
00140                 iss >> NO_OF_CHANNELS;
00141                 */
00142             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_RANKS") == 0)
00143                 iss >> NO_OF_RANKS;
00144             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_BANKS") == 0)
00145                 iss >> NO_OF_BANKS;
00146                 
00147             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_ROWS") == 0)
00148                 iss >> NO_OF_ROWS;
00149             if ( word.compare("NO_OF_COLUMNS") == 0)
00150                 iss >> NO_OF_COLUMNS;
00151             if ( word.compare("COLUMN_SIZE") == 0)
00152                 iss >> COLUMN_SIZE;
00153             if ( word.compare("MSHR_SIZE") == 0)
00154                 iss >> MSHR_SIZE;
00155                 
00156             if ( word.compare("MAX_BUFFER_SIZE") == 0)
00157                 iss >> MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00158             if ( word.compare("MAX_CMD_BUFFER_SIZE") == 0)
00159                 iss >> MAX_CMD_BUFFER_SIZE;
00160             if ( word.compare("RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE") == 0)
00161                 iss >> RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE;
00162              
00163             if ( word.compare("NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS") == 0)
00164                 iss >> NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS;
00165             if ( word.compare("NETWORK_THREADID_BITS") == 0)
00166                 iss >> NETWORK_THREADID_BITS ;
00167             if ( word.compare("NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS") == 0)
00168                 iss >> NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS;
00169 
00170             /*  ******************************************* */
00171             if ( word.compare("TWO_STAGE_ROUTER") == 0)
00172                 iss >> do_two_stage_router;
00173             if ( word.compare("ROUTING_SCHEME") == 0)
00174                 iss >> routing_scheme;
00175             if ( word.compare("SW_ARBITRATION") == 0)
00176                 iss >> sw_arbitration_scheme;
00177             if ( word.compare("PRIORITY_MSG_TYPE") == 0)
00178                 iss >> msg_type_string;
00179             if ( word.compare("DRAM_PAGE_POLICY") == 0)
00180                 iss >> dram_page_policy_string;
00181             if ( word.compare("ADDRESS_MAP_SCHEME") == 0)
00182                 iss >> addr_map_scheme_string;
00183             if ( word.compare("MC_SCHEDULING_ALGORITHM") == 0)
00184                 iss >> mc_scheduling_algorithm_string;
00185             if ( word.compare("TRACE") == 0)
00186             {
00187                 iss >> trace_name;
00188                 traces.push_back(trace_name);
00189             }
00190             if ( word.compare("MC_LOC") == 0)
00191             {
00192                 uint mc_xpos, mc_ypos;
00193                 iss >> mc_xpos;
00194                 iss >> mc_ypos;
00195                 mc_positions.push_back(mc_xpos*grid_size + mc_ypos);
00196             }
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     for ( uint i=0; i<argc; i++)
00201     {
00202         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--thread_id_bits")==0)
00203             THREAD_BITS_POSITION = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00204         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--mc_bits")==0)
00205             MC_ADDR_BITS = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00206         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--router_two_stg")==0)
00207             do_two_stage_router = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00208         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--routing_scheme")==0)
00209             routing_scheme = argv[i+1];
00210         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--sw_arbitration")==0)
00211             sw_arbitration_scheme = argv[i+1];
00212         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--msg_type")==0)
00213             msg_type_string = argv[i+1];
00214         if( strcmp(argv[i],"--bank_bits")==0)
00215             BANK_BITS = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00216     }
00217 
00218     if( routing_scheme.compare("odd-even") == 0)
00219         rc_method = ODD_EVEN;
00220     if( strcmp(routing_scheme.c_str(),"negative-first") == 0)
00221         rc_method = NEGATIVE_FIRST;
00222     if( strcmp(routing_scheme.c_str(),"west-first") == 0)
00223         rc_method = WEST_FIRST;
00224     if( strcmp(routing_scheme.c_str(),"north-last") == 0)
00225         rc_method = NORTH_LAST;
00226     if( strcmp(routing_scheme.c_str(),"north-last-nm") == 0)
00227         rc_method = NORTH_LAST_NON_MINIMAL;
00228     if( routing_scheme.compare("xy") == 0)
00229         rc_method = XY;
00230 
00231     if( strcmp(sw_arbitration_scheme.c_str(),"round-robin") == 0)
00232         sw_arbitration = ROUND_ROBIN;
00233     if( strcmp(sw_arbitration_scheme.c_str(),"round-robin-p") == 0)
00234         sw_arbitration = ROUND_ROBIN_PRIORITY;
00235     if( strcmp(sw_arbitration_scheme.c_str(),"fcfs") == 0)
00236         sw_arbitration = FCFS;
00237 
00238     if( strcmp(msg_type_string.c_str(),"PRIORITY_REQ") == 0)
00239         priority_msg_type = PRIORITY_REQ;
00240     if( strcmp(msg_type_string.c_str(),"ONE_FLIT_REQ") == 0)
00241         priority_msg_type = ONE_FLIT_REQ;
00242     if( strcmp(msg_type_string.c_str(),"RESPONSE_PKT") == 0)
00243         priority_msg_type = RESPONSE_PKT;
00244  
00245     if( dram_page_policy_string.compare("OPEN_PAGE_POLICY") == 0)
00246         dram_page_policy = OPEN_PAGE_POLICY;
00247     if( dram_page_policy_string.compare("CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY") == 0)
00248         dram_page_policy = CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY;
00249     
00250     if( mc_scheduling_algorithm_string.compare("FR_FCFS") == 0)
00251         mc_scheduling_algorithm = FR_FCFS;
00252     if( mc_scheduling_algorithm_string.compare("FC_FS") == 0)
00253         mc_scheduling_algorithm = FC_FS;
00254     if( mc_scheduling_algorithm_string.compare("PAR_BS") == 0)
00255         mc_scheduling_algorithm = PAR_BS;
00256     
00257     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("PAGE_INTERLEAVING") == 0)
00258         addr_map_scheme = PAGE_INTERLEAVING;
00259     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("PERMUTATION") == 0)
00260         addr_map_scheme = PERMUTATION;
00261     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("CACHELINE_INTERLEAVING") == 0)
00262         addr_map_scheme = CACHELINE_INTERLEAVING;
00263     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("GENERIC") == 0)
00264         addr_map_scheme = GENERIC;
00265     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("NO_SCHEME") == 0)
00266         addr_map_scheme = NO_SCHEME;
00267     if( addr_map_scheme_string.compare("LOCAL_ADDR_MAP") == 0)
00268         addr_map_scheme = LOCAL_ADDR_MAP;
00269  
00270     if( router_model_string.compare("VIRTUAL_4STAGE") == 0)
00271         router_model = VIRTUAL_4STAGE;
00272     if( router_model_string.compare("PHYSICAL_3STAGE") == 0)
00273         router_model = PHYSICAL_3STAGE;
00274     if( mc_model_string.compare("GENERIC_MC") == 0)
00275         mc_model = GENERIC_MC;
00276     if( mc_model_string.compare("FLAT_MC") == 0)
00277         mc_model = FLAT_MC;
00278 
00279     /* Number of MC's and the size of the position vector should be the same. */
00280         assert(mc_positions.size() == no_mcs);
00281 
00282     /* Compute additional parameters */
00283     links = (ports + (grid_size -1)*(ports-1)) + ( (ports-1) + (grid_size -1)*(ports-2))*(grid_size-1);
00284     fd.close();
00285 
00286     cerr << "\n-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n";
00287     cerr << "** CAPSTONE - Cycle Accurate Parallel Simulator Technologgy for On-Chip Networks **\n";
00288     cerr << " This is simIris. A second version of Capstone." << endl;
00289     cerr << "-- Computer Architecture and Systems Lab                                         --\n"
00290         << "-- Georgia Institute of Technology                                               --\n"
00291         << "-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n";
00292     cerr << "Cmd line: ";
00293     for( int i=0; i<argc; i++)
00294         cerr << argv[i] << " ";
00295     cerr << endl;
00296 
00297     dump_configuration();
00298     init_dram_timing_parameters();
00299     mesh = new Mesh();
00300     mesh->init( ports, vcs, credits, buffer_size, no_nodes, grid_size, links);
00301     mesh->max_sim_time = max_sim_time;
00302 
00303     /* Create the mesh->routers and mesh->interfaces */
00304     for( uint i=0; i<no_nodes; i++)
00305     {
00306         switch ( router_model )
00307         {
00308             case PHYSICAL_3STAGE:
00309                 mesh->routers.push_back( new GenericRouterAdaptive());
00310                 break;
00311             case VIRTUAL_4STAGE:
00312                 mesh->routers.push_back( new GenericRouterVcs());
00313                 break;
00314             default:
00315                 cout << " Incorrect router model " << endl;
00316                 exit(1);
00317                 break;
00318         }
00319         mesh->interfaces.push_back ( new GenericInterfaceVcs());
00320     }
00321 
00322     /*  Create the TPG and mc modules */
00323     vector<uint>::iterator itr;
00324     for( uint i=0; i<no_nodes; i++)
00325     {
00326         itr = find(mc_positions.begin(), mc_positions.end(), i);
00327         if( itr != mc_positions.end())
00328         {
00329             switch ( mc_model )
00330             {
00331                 case GENERIC_MC:
00332                     mesh->processors.push_back( new NI() );
00333                     break;
00334                 case FLAT_MC:
00335                     mesh->processors.push_back( new GenericFlatMc());
00336                     break;
00337                 default:
00338                     cout << " Unknown MC model " << endl;
00339                     exit(1);
00340                     break;
00341             }
00342         }
00343         else
00344         {
00345             mesh->processors.push_back( new GenericTPGVcs() );
00346             static_cast<GenericTPGVcs*>(mesh->processors[i])->set_trace_filename(traces[i]);
00347             for ( uint j=0; j<mc_positions.size(); j++)
00348             {
00349                 static_cast<GenericTPGVcs*>(mesh->processors[i])->mc_node_ip.push_back(mc_positions[j]);;
00350             }
00351         }
00352     }
00353 
00354     /* Create the links */
00355     for ( uint i=0; i<links; i++)
00356     { 
00357         mesh->link_a.push_back(new GenericLink());
00358         mesh->link_b.push_back(new GenericLink());
00359     }
00360 
00361     mesh->connect_interface_processor();
00362 
00363     /* Set all the component ids */
00364     uint comp_id = 0, alink_comp_id = 1000, blink_comp_id = 5000;
00365     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00366     {
00367         mesh->processors[i]->setComponentId(comp_id++);
00368         //        mesh->processors[i]->my_mesh = (void*)mesh;
00369         mesh->interfaces[i]->setComponentId(comp_id++);
00370         mesh->routers[i]->setComponentId(comp_id++);
00371     }
00372 
00373     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links; i++ )
00374     {
00375         mesh->link_a[i]->setComponentId(alink_comp_id++);
00376         mesh->link_b[i]->setComponentId(blink_comp_id++);
00377         mesh->link_a[i]->setup();
00378         mesh->link_b[i]->setup();
00379     }
00380     cout << " ******************** SETUP COMPLETE " << endl;
00381     /*  Set up the node ips for components */
00382     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00383     {
00384         mesh->interfaces[i]->node_ip = i;
00385         mesh->routers[i]->node_ip = i;
00386         mesh->processors[i]->node_ip = i;
00387     }
00388 
00389     /* Set the number of ports, vcs, credits and buffer sizes for the
00390      * components */
00391     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00392     {
00393         mesh->interfaces[i]->set_no_vcs(vcs);
00394         mesh->interfaces[i]->set_no_credits(credits);
00395         mesh->interfaces[i]->set_buffer_size(credits);
00396         //        mesh->processors[i]->set_output_path(output_path);
00397     }
00398 
00399     mesh->setup();
00400     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00401         mesh->processors[i]->set_output_path(output_path);
00402 
00403     /*  Set no of ports and positions for routing */
00404     vector< uint > grid_x;
00405     vector< uint > grid_y;
00406     grid_x.resize(no_nodes);
00407     grid_y.resize(no_nodes);
00408 
00409     /* Limitation of only modelling squares */
00410     for ( uint i=0 ; i<grid_size ; i++ )
00411         for ( uint j=0 ; j<grid_size ; j++ )
00412         {
00413             grid_x[(i*grid_size)+j] = j;
00414             grid_y[(i*grid_size)+j] = i;
00415         }
00416 
00417 
00418     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00419         mesh->routers[i]->set_no_nodes(no_nodes);
00420 
00421     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00422         for( uint j=0; j < ports ; j++)
00423             for( uint k=0; k < no_nodes ; k++) // Assuming is a square mesh. 
00424             {
00425                 static_cast<Router*>(mesh->routers[i])->set_grid_x_location(j,k, grid_x[k]);
00426                 static_cast<Router*>(mesh->routers[i])->set_grid_y_location(j,k, grid_y[k]);
00427             }
00428 
00429     mesh->connect_interface_routers();
00430     mesh->connect_routers();
00431 
00432     /*  Printing out all component after setup */
00433     if( print_setup )
00434     {
00435         for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00436         {
00437             cout << "\nTPG: " << i << " " << mesh->processors[i]->toString();
00438             cout << "\ninterface: " << i << " " << mesh->interfaces[i]->toString();
00439             cout << "\nrouter: " << i << " " << mesh->routers[i]->toString();
00440         }
00441 
00442         for ( uint i=0 ; i<links ; i++ )
00443         {
00444             cout << "\nlinka_" << i << " " << mesh->link_a[i]->toString();
00445             cout << "\nlinkb_" << i << " " << mesh->link_b[i]->toString();
00446         }
00447     }
00448 
00449     Simulator::StopAt(max_sim_time);
00450     Simulator::Run();
00451 
00452     cerr << mesh->print_stats();
00453     ullint total_link_utilization = 0;
00454     uint no_of_non_zero_util_links = 0;
00455     uint edge_links = 0;
00456     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links ; i++ )
00457     {
00458         double link_util = mesh->link_a[i]->get_flits_utilization();
00459         if( link_util )
00460             no_of_non_zero_util_links++;
00461         if( mesh->link_a[i]->input_connection == NULL || mesh->link_a[i]->output_connection == NULL )
00462             edge_links++;
00463 
00464         total_link_utilization += (ullint)link_util;
00465     }
00466 
00467     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links ; i++ )
00468     {
00469         double link_util = mesh->link_b[i]->get_flits_utilization();
00470         total_link_utilization += (ullint)link_util;
00471         if( link_util )
00472             no_of_non_zero_util_links++;
00473         if( mesh->link_b[i]->input_connection == NULL || mesh->link_b[i]->output_connection == NULL )
00474             edge_links++;
00475     }
00476 
00477     double bytes_delivered = (total_link_utilization + 0.0 )*max_phy_link_bits/(8*max_sim_time*0.33e-9); /* Assuming 1flit=1phit */
00478     double available_bw = ((2*links - edge_links )*max_phy_link_bits + 0.0)/(8*0.33e-9);
00479     cerr << "\n\n************** Link Stats ***************\n";
00480     cerr << " Total flits passed on the links: " << total_link_utilization << endl;
00481     cerr << " Links used: " << no_of_non_zero_util_links << " of " << 2*links - edge_links << " links." << endl;
00482     cerr << " Avg flits per link used " << (total_link_utilization+0.0)/no_of_non_zero_util_links << endl;
00483     cerr << " Net bytes delivered:(A) " << bytes_delivered*1e-9 << " MB. " << endl;
00484     cerr << " Max BW available in the network:(B) " << available_bw*1e-9 << " MB. " << endl;
00485     cerr << " \% A/B " << bytes_delivered/available_bw << endl;
00486 
00487     ullint tot_pkts = 0, tot_pkts_out = 0, tot_flits = 0;
00488     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00489     {
00490         tot_pkts_out += mesh->interfaces[i]->get_packets_out();
00491         tot_pkts += mesh->interfaces[i]->get_packets();
00492         tot_flits += mesh->interfaces[i]->get_flits_out();
00493     }
00494 
00495     ullint sim_time_ms = (time(NULL) - sim_start_time);
00496     cerr << "\n\n************** Simulation Stats ***************\n";
00497     cerr << " Simulation Time: " << sim_time_ms << " s. " << endl;
00498     cerr << " No of pkts per s: " << (tot_pkts+0.0)/sim_time_ms<< endl;
00499     cerr << " No of flits per s: " << (tot_flits+0.0)/sim_time_ms << endl;
00500     cerr << " Total Mem Req serviced: " << tot_pkts_out/2 << endl;
00501     cerr << "------------ End SimIris ---------------------" << endl;
00502 
00503     delete mesh;
00504 
00505     return 0;
00506 }                               /* ----------  end of function main  ---------- */
